name: NEPTvola
description: A slightly less horrible volafile theme based off Volakai
additional_info:
-Installation-

-Install the 'Stylish' plugin from the add-on store of your browser
-Press the big install button at the top of this page

-Release Notes-

2nd April 2018:
-Files uploaded by logged in users will now have a green name tag in the file bin

3rd November 2017:
-couple fixes and tweaks for mobile theme

1st October 2017:
-more fixes for new broken things

19th September 2017:
-fixed all the broken stuff after updates

2nd May 2017:
-bug fixes
-updates
-filter icons now the same color as file bin icons
-progress bar when uploading files

21st November 2016:
-files in the file bin now zoom in slightly when you hover over them
-patched leak that was causing information to be sent back in time

8th December 2016:
-fixed "new file notifier" showing as blue instead of light grey
-removed text shadows (glowing effect)
-the time leak patch has had unexpected consequences and as a result has been reverted

9th December 2016:
-small updates to accommodate new volafile

17th December 2016:
-Changed new message notification Icon
-New font
-Text at bottom and top of chat fades out
